      • createResultingMessage

        public Message createResultingMessage(Party sender,
                                      Party reciever,
                                      java.lang.String text)
                               throws IllegalOperationExcetion
        Creates a resulting message.
        Parameters:
        sender - The sender party of the message.
        reciever - The recieve party of the message.
        text - The text of the resulting message.
        Returns:
        Returns an instance of newly created Resulting message.
        Throws:
        IllegalOperationExcetion - Throw IllegalOperationExcetion if the sender party is null.

      • finishMessageCreationProcess

        public void finishMessageCreationProcess(Party reciever)
        Finishes the message creation process by adding a reciever to the message which is underconstruction.
        Parameters:
        reciever - The reciever of the message. Catches the IllegalOperationException if the reciever is not a valid reciever and removes the message from sender list.

        Returns the list of message in terms of clone, sent by this party.
